attributes.action: work with the EU  to ensure that if a European Army is established that it will be based within the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to know that if a European Army or defence force is established, that the Prime Minister will make sure it is based in the UK and that it works closely with the British Armed Forces to prevent them from coming under the direct control of the EU and or from loosing their effectiveness and reputation as an Armed Force.
